summary: I’m trying not to offend anyone but can people shut up about phan (well not shut up about it but stop saying “no more phan, I’m...
body: I’m trying not to offend anyone but can people shut up about phan (well not shut up about it but stop saying “no more phan, I’m respecting them”). Everyone now has suddenly stopped shipping it since Dans video. Everyone now says people don’t respect them if we mention it at all. But guess what. Phan was never fully confirmed. Yes dan said they were a thing but that doesn’t mean they still are, of they still could be together but that doesn’t mean we have to stop shipping phan. We’ve always shipped phan. Dan and Phil created phan. Just because in Dans video he said him and Phil want to keep their personal life private (which I would too) doesn’t mean we can’t ship phan. If they tell us to stop.. that’s when we stop. They said a long time ago they were okay with it (and of course things can change). Yes in Dans video he did mention people forcing themselves into his personal life making it worse but not everyone does that. Most of us who ship phan are very respectful towards people and will stop when it becomes too much. We will stop if told to and correct our mistakes when realised they have been made. So, please, stop saying all this crap about phan just because now it’s apparently illegal to everyone. And feel free to correct me on anything I may have gotten wrong <3

blog.name: smthnsmh
blog.title: miami-shell’s fandom sideblog
blog.description:
mostly Voltron --> She-ra

————————————————————

I don’t really drop content until it’s over,

but I’ll be critical of sucky things they do,

but not obsessive-negative bc that’s rough,

so there’s that

————————————————————

second tier: Star Wars, Star Trek, Marvel

————————————————————

occasional / when it effing airs again, jfc: Yuuri on Ice|Brooklyn Nine-Nine|Oceans #s

————————————————————

idek when u’ll see this stuff but it’s pretty popular so it should be okay and u’ll get it: Harry Potter, LotR, Rick Riordan universe, Disney & Pixar stuff + a number of other TV and movie series & books & people (1D will never leave my heart, so that might crop up sporadically)

tags: go read and get educated friends

summary: I find Eugene Lee Yang’s coming out video absolutely breathtaking and heart touching and a true piece of art (especially after...
body:
I find Eugene Lee Yang’s coming out video absolutely breathtaking and heart touching and a true piece of art (especially after watching his explanation for it). How well everything was thought out and how personal it was for him truly shines through. As someone who relates deeply to experiencing a lot of cultural prejudice as a gay person, as well as someone who expresses themselves artistically, this really hits home, and makes me want to dance and sing and CREATE about my experience and shout it to the world, hoping it might just be as powerful as Eugene’s video.

Daniel Howell’s comeback with a coming out video so well-worded and open and it truly warmed my heart. How sincere and honest he is all throughout it about such difficult subjects as sexuality, self-acceptance, suicide, bullying, labels, and privacy was as touching as it was graceful. I stopped watching DnP about a year ago but I still felt incredibly proud of Dan and so BEYOND happy to see how far he has come.

Overall, this pride month rocks. I feel so much love in this Chili’s tonight, and I couldn’t wish for a better community ♥️
